casebody.data:
THOMAS D. MATTHEWS and SNEAD MATTHEWS, his wife, v. ED H. STANLEY and J. HARRY SCHAD, as guardian ad litem for ED H. STANLEY, an insane person. 25 So. (2nd) 565

January Term, 1946

March 29, 1946 Division B J. C. Adkins and J. C. Adkins, Jr., for petitioners. H. 0. Brown and J. Harry Schad, for respondents. PER CURIAM:

This cause is before the Court on Petition for Rehearing, and after a careful consideration of each ground thereof, the Court is of the view that the Petition should be denied upon authority of Hollywood, Inc. v. Clark, 153 Fla. 501, 15 So. (2nd) 175.

CHAPMAN, C. J., BROWN, THOMAS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
